name: MechIES -- The Online Mech Battle Arena -- (Canceled)
blurb: MechIES puts you in your own mobile mech to battle in online arenas against friends and foes. Play your Mech, your way, to victory!

rewards.reward: No Reward

You are awesome! You will receive an Ad free copy of the game on the device of your choosing once it is complete. You will also receive a unique Desktop Wallpaper. Your name will also appear in the games credits as a Backer!        ------------------------------------------------------------------------             As a Backer you are also allowed into the Backer only Forums to discuss content and poll ideas for the game. Don't forget to join them at: http://mechies.circleboxstudios.com/forums ------------------------------------------------------------------------ \r\nRegister for the Forums and then post a comment here in the comment section with your Forum name to get accepted into the forums as a Backer.
You will receive the above PLUS another Mech Garage slot AND 2 paint kits of your choosing.

You will receive all of the above PLUS a unique backer only Mech skin that will set you apart from the crowd. You will also have all locked maps and arena types completely unlocked. In addition to these, you will also be able to reserve a User Name.

You will receive all of the above at launch PLUS you will get to be in the BETA for iPhone/iPod. Your input will directly shape the released game AND you will be playing on many occasions with the developers from whom you will learn early inside secrets. You will also receive an additional Mech Garage slot!

You will receive all of the above at launch PLUS you will get to be in the BETA for Android. Your input will directly shape the released game AND you will be playing on many occasions with the developers from whom you will learn early inside secrets. You will also receive an additional Mech Garage slot!

Your input will directly shape the released game AND you will be playing on many occasions with the developers from whom you will learn early inside secrets. You will also receive an additional Mech Garage slot!

Your input will directly shape the released game AND you will be playing on many occasions with the developers from whom you will learn early inside secrets. You will also receive an additional Mech Garage slot!

You will receive all of the above at launch PLUS you will get to be in the BETA for Windows. Your input will directly shape the released game AND you will be playing on many occasions with the developers from whom you will learn early inside secrets. You will also receive an additional Mech Garage slot!

You will receive all of the above at launch PLUS you will get to be in the BETA for Linux. Your input will directly shape the released game AND you will be playing on many occasions with the developers from whom you will learn early inside secrets. You will also receive an additional Mech Garage slot!

You will receive all of the above, EXCLUDING the iOS/Mac BETAs, PLUS you will receive your third Mech Garage slot plus an additional paint kit. You will also start the game 3 ranks in with 2 of your Mech Slots completely geared with the best gear you can get at that rank.

You will receive all of the above, EXCLUDING the iOS/Mac BETAs, PLUS your third Mech slot will now be fully geared as well. We will also include a PDF with concept art, artist sketches, developer notes, and more!
You will receive all of the above, EXCLUDING the iOS/Mac BETAs, PLUS your will receive a Backer exclusive MechIES mouse pad.
You will receive all of the above, EXCLUDING the iOS/Mac BETAs, PLUS your will receive a Backer exclusive MechIES T-shirt.

You will receive all of the above, EXCLUDING the iOS/Mac BETAs, PLUS you will receive a Backer exclusive MechIES mobile phone case of your choosing. The graphic used on these mobile phone cases will never again be used or publicly released. SO there will be no more copies of this case ever again.

You will receive all of the above, INCLUDING the BETA for iPhone/iPod, PLUS you will get to Skype with at least 1 member of the development team so you can ask any questions you may have including game secrets. You will ALSO receive a limited addition MechIES poster signed by the team!

You will receive all of the above, INCLUDING the BETA for Android, PLUS you will get to Skype with at least 1 member of the development team so you can ask any questions you may have including game secrets. You will ALSO receive a limited addition MechIES poster signed by the team!

You will receive all of the above, INCLUDING the BETA for iPad, PLUS you will get to Skype with at least 1 member of the development team so you can ask any questions you may have including game secrets. You will ALSO receive a limited addition MechIES poster signed by the team!

You will receive all of the above, INCLUDING the BETA for the platform of your choosing, PLUS you will get to talk with the Lead Artist to design your very own Mech skin the way you want AND you will be the only person to EVER have this Mech skin.\r\n------------------------------------------------------------------------ *Shipping charge for physical items in the tiers above.

LIMITED EXCLUSIVE::: You will get all of the above INCLUDING the BETA for the platform of your choosing (Excluding the other $1,000 rewards) PLUS you will get to personally design one of the weapons in the game! You will work with our Artists to design the look, functionality, and even name it. (Design must be within reason). You can choose existing weapons that weren't planned to be in the game or create your own! Once finished and implemented into the game, whenever you equip the weapon you have designed it will stand out from the rest with a unique glow or animation. Others will know you are the weapons creator and master! Plus your name will appear in the credits as the designer of your weapon.
------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
(These weapons may or may not appear in the initial launch of the game, but will most certainly be added in updates within the first 3 months of launch.)
------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
*Shipping charge is for physical items in the tiers above.

LIMITED EXCLUSIVE::: You will get all of the above INCLUDING the BETA for the platform of your choosing (Excluding the other $1,000 rewards) PLUS you will get to personally design one of the maps in the game! You will work with our Artists to design the look, functionality, and even name it. (Design must be within reason).  Once finished and implemented into the game, whenever you are on the map you designed you will stand out from the rest with a unique glow. Others will know you are the maps creator! We will also include your name in the credits as the designer of your map.            ------------------------------------------------------------------------ (These maps may or may not appear in the initial launch of the game, but will most certainly be added in updates within the first 3 months of launch.) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ *Shipping charge is for physical items in the tiers above.

You will receive all of the above, INCLUDING the BETA for the platform of your choosing, PLUS you will get a limited addition (no more than 10 made) signed concept art book. ------------------------------------------------------------------------ Excludes the Limited Exclusives, unless limited availability has not been exceeded. It will then be on a first come first serve basis starting with the $5,000 tier down. ------------------------------------------------------------------------  *Shipping charge is for physical items in the tiers above.

You will receive all of the above, INCLUDING the BETA for the platform of your choosing, PLUS you will get a limited addition (no more than 5 made) signed Lego MechIES model hand-built by a member of the team. Each Lego model constructed will be one of a kind, signed, and numbered.  ------------------------------------------------------------------------\r\nExcludes the Limited Exclusives, unless limited availability has not been exceeded. It will then be on a first come first serve basis starting with the $5,000 tier down. ------------------------------------------------------------------------ *Shipping charge is for physical items in the tiers above.

You are AMAZING! You will receive everything above INCLUDING both Limited Exclusives. You will have access to 3 BETA's of your choosing. You will get a super unique title in game. (Only you and whomever else donates at this level will have it). You will get a second MechIES skin designed by us for you (it will be amazing looking and you will most certainly stand out!). PLUS you will have a "Producer" title in the Credits!
